discussion.content:
Action 2: Use the street team mobile application for sales order creation
Feature: B) Dual Write

Dual Write is a feature in Dynamics 365 that enables real-time synchronization of data between Finance and Operations apps (such as Supply Chain Management) and Customer Engagement apps (such as Sales). In this case, the street team needs to be able to create sales orders through their mobile application. By utilizing Dual Write, the sales order data entered in the mobile application can be seamlessly synchronized and integrated with the Dynamics 365 system, specifically with the Sales module. This ensures that the sales orders created by the street team are accurately captured and reflected in the overall sales process within Dynamics 365.

Answer has to be Dual-write for both I think. 
Reason is that "No street team representatives will have access to the Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management application". An OData call direct to D365 SCM will use the security access that the user has setup in D365. Instead the data needs to be stored in the Dataverse and D365 needs updated via Dual-write. This is applicable for product information queries as well as sales order creations.

I would answer
